name: AlNoorani Exports
overview:
Established in the year 2000, we, “Al Noorani Exports”, are one of the most renowned names of the market engaged in exporting and supplying a wide range of Fresh Vegetables, Fresh Fruits, Indian Vegetables and Leafy Vegetables. In our range, we offer Vegetable Drumstick, Green Pea, Bottle Gourd, Curry Leaves, Bitter Gourd, Green Chilli and Snake Gourd.

Quality Policy / Processes: In order to offer superior quality Fresh Fruits & Vegetables in the market, we been associated with some of the most trusted vendors of the industry. These products are cultivated or grown at large farms, orchards or fields. The entire range is grown without using pesticides or other harmful products and by employing the most modern technology, methodology & equipment.

Memberships/Affiliations: Agricultural & Processed Food Products Export Development Authority-APEDA National Horticulture Research & Development Foundation-NHRDF National Agriculture Co-Operative Marketing Federation of India Ltd. NAFED Spices Board of India

Our Infrastructure: Our warehousing unit enables the safe and a streamlined storage of our products as our warehouse is segmented into various sections and equipped with all the advanced tools driven by modern technology.

Our Team: We have been supported by a team of highly experienced and qualified professionals, which helps us in offering an excellent range of Fresh Vegetables, Fresh Fruits, Indian Vegetables and Leafy Vegetables to the customers. These professionals make sure to procure the products as per the market demand. Our procuring agents select the best vendors for our organisation.

Vendor Base: In order to offer a wide range of Fresh Vegetables, Fresh Fruits, Indian Vegetables and Leafy Vegetables in the market, we have associated ourselves with some of the most well-known vendors of the industry. The vendors for our organisation are selected on the basis of their goodwill, past clientele, competitive prices and others.
